name: 10th International Conference on Software Engineering
content: 10th International Conference on Software Engineering (SOFT 2024) May 25 \~ 26, 2024, Vancouver, Canada https://icaita2024.org/soft/index Scope 10th International Conference on Software Engineering (SOFT 2024) will provide an excellent international forum for sharing knowledge and results in theory, methodology and applications of Software Engineering and Applications. The goal of this conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on understanding Modern software engineering concepts and establishing new collaborations in these areas. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to.
